Doc: I can be in charge of the support. My systems can be used as a
server =
for data any of you register and transmit it to the others...
and I have a =
sniper that can kill a flea off a dog's back 500 kms
away. Give me a high s=
pot, and I'll give you the best cover you've
ever had.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoo=
groups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
>
> ::Rodimus Prime::
> =

> Rodimus stands up, volunteering.
> 
> Rodimus: I volunteer to lead the s=
econd team. If the Predacon gets
past your team and the negotiations, I'll =
see to it that he does not
reach the city. I agree that this situation is t=
oo dangerous for my
daughter. I'll inform her to remain in the city and to =
help with
establishing the defenses. I believe that Nighlight would do the =
same.
> 
> Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:                                 
=
"Unfortunately, because we know little of this bot, and because it is
a hea=
vily-armed Predacon, it is safe to assume that this bot is
hostile.  We hav=
e gone to radio silence with the security forces
because we don't want to g=
et them involved.  They are still fairly
week since the last attack. 
> 
> =
"Another problem facing us, is that we have filled our two holding
cells al=
ready.  Ordinarily this wouldn't be a problem because we would
just use the=
 police station, however that is not an option either due
to the previous a=
ttack. 
> 
> "I don't think we can afford to take any more prisoners, so we=
 will
have to find some way to drive off this intruder, reason with it, or
=
render it unconscious and take it somewhere far away."
> 
>  He hit a butto=
n and brought up a map of the port region of the city.
> 
> "What I propose=
 is that we divide into three teams.  The first team
will be lead by myself=
.  I would like two of you with me.  We will go
down and directly confront =
this bot.  The first team will have a set
of capture gear in case things tu=
rn violent. 
> 
> "The second team will be our backup and will try to keep =
the bot
from reaching the city.  Since there is only a single ramp up from =
the
port into the rest of the city, this shouldn't be a problem, however
th=
is team's role is crucial.  They will also have a set of capture gear. 
> 
=
> "Finally, our third team will be assisting the troops here in case
the ba=
se comes under attack.  This team can consist of one or two
people because =
they will have the troopers, Salveo, and Kenzo to back
them up if the base =
is breached." 
> 
> "The base will remain in high-security lockdown the ent=
ire time. 
The main entrance will be fully armed and guarded.  The shields =
will
remain up.  Teams one and two will leave though the lower entrance
tun=
nel near the holding cells.  After they leave, we'll close all the
partitio=
n blast doors to ensure that the base is well fortified." 
> 
> "Salveo wil=
l remain here to direct the mission over the radio. 
Kenzo, you can choose =
to stay in the medical bay or defend the front
enterance.  Remember that it=
 will be difficult to move around once the
partitions are up.  Nightlight a=
nd Elita;  I don't want Elita to get
hurt, she should remain somewhere safe=
.  Nightlight may make her own
decision whether she fights or not." 
> 
> "=
Questions, Comments, Volunteers?" concluded Lord Perseus.
> 
>
